item.title: My Mac Dev Setup and Favorite Tools
item.description: How I setup and use my computer and tools for development. I wrote this mostly as a guide for myself, for the next time I setup a computer, and hope it might be useful to others too. I’d love to hear your thoughts, ideas and additional tips in the comments below! Related: How I setup my Terminal and Bash.
